metadata.description: Name of this LogicApp.
Location (region) or ISE that this LogicApp is to be deployed to. Defaults to the ResourceGroup location.
Initial state of the LogicApp after it is deployed.
Name of the ResourceGroup that MessageBus artifacts are deployed to (e.g. APIM or RoutingSlipRouter LogicApp).
Name of the ResourceGroup that SystemApplication artifacts are deployed to (e.g. ServiceBus or MessageConstructor LogicApp).
Name of the IntegrationAccount connected to this LogicApp.
Name of the LogicApp to call to handle FTP Message Construction and Sending.
Name of the LogicApp to call to handle suspending of messages.
Name of the ServiceBus Topic that suspended messages are sent to.
Name of the APIM Service used for MessageBus operations.
Subscription Key used to access APIM.
Retry Policy to use when calling APIM.
Name of the API Connection used for FTP Receive operations.
The path where the FTP connector looks for new/updated files.
The max number of files the FTP Connector will retrieve per polling interval.
The mask to use to decide if we're processing a given file e.g. *.* or *.csv
The frequency with which to check for new files on the FTP server.
The interval with which to check for new files on the FTP server.
Name of the API Connection used for ServiceBus SuspendQueue Publish operations.
The name of the Scenario that this LogicApp is running under e.g. ApplicationName + ReceivePort/Location Name.
The step within a Scenario that this LogicApp is running under e.g. ftpReceiveAdapter.

ftpReceiveFolder.description: The path where the FTP connector looks for new/updated files.

ftpMaxFileCount.description: The max number of files the FTP Connector will retrieve per polling interval.

ftpRecurrenceFrequency.description: The frequency with which to check for new files on the FTP server.

ftpRecurrenceInterval.description: The interval with which to check for new files on the FTP server.

fileNameMask.description: The mask to use to decide if we're processing a given file e.g. *.* or *.csv

apimSubscriptionKey.description: Subscription Key used to access APIM.

scenario.description: The name of the Scenario that this LogicApp is running under e.g. ApplicationName + ReceivePort/Location Name.

scenarioStep.description: The step within a Scenario that this LogicApp is running under e.g. FTPReceiveAdapter.

clearCache.description: Indicates if we should clear APIM cache before retrieved config items e.g. configurationEntries or routingSlips.

suspendQueueTopicName.description: Name of the ServiceBus Topic that suspended messages are sent to.
